name: Ski Highlands Bowl
description: You must hike to the top of highlands bowl and then rip down some of the steepest terrain in Colorado.

name: Ski Vail's Legendary Backbowls
description: Vail has seven bowls of epic terrain,  can you ski every bowl in one day?

name: Surf in Mexico
description: Surf with the locals in Mexico, catch a wave at the secret break La Lancha.

name: Bike the 401 Trail
description: Fly down the majestic 401 Trail in Crested Butte

name: Sleep Under the Stars
description: One of the darkest places on earth is in Utah, enjoy the stars without any light to ruin your view.
